description: This is a very nice basic editor for markdown. It is nothing fancy, but does all of the core functions that are needed to daily casual use.
really good! minimalist and clutter free.
It's a really good Markdown app, but the author told me it's deprecated and unmaintained.

1) Found a bug. Switching the tabs does not change the current file
2) Preview is ugly

It looks nice and I like the markdown preview. But cannot save file not even export it as HTML. On the left side I cannot see the outline updating (I tried writing a few headers and they did not appear).
Also would be nice if I had to option to pop-out the markdown cheatsheet so that I can look at it while I'm writing.
summary: It has a nice feel but cannot save

description: Great keyboard shortcut, the author is not trying to reinvent the wheel - gtk is a great choice. The only thing that I am missing is ability to set default new file folder. Despite that, it's my favourite note-taking app for linux
Cette application est parfaite pour éditer efficacement des fichiers Markdown. La détection automatique des titres et des sous-titres dans la section "Outline" est ma fonctionnalité préférée !
summary: Très bonne application, je recommande fortement !
